title: How to Get Tickets to Coldplay’s 2025 US, Canadian Tour Dates
description: Coldplay are bringing their record-setting "Music of the Spheres World Tour" back to North America in 2025. Learn how to get tickets here. How to Get Tickets to Coldplay’s 2025 US, Canadian Tour Dates Paolo Ragusa

They’ve continuously extended the tour with multiple legs over the last few years, making the 2025 run their fourth stint in the US since 2021. As such, the band are hitting several cities that they’ve missed in previous North American runs, like Toronto, Denver, Las Vegas, and more. The North American tour begins with a show at Stanford Stadium in Stanford, California on May 31st, 2025. The run continues with shows in Las Vegas, Denver, El Paso, Toronto (marking some of the first-ever concerts at the brand new Rogers Stadium), Foxborough, Madison, and Nashville, concluding with a July 26th show in Miami. Coldplay aren’t just touring this continent next year — they have a slew of international tour dates planned for 2025, including shows in United Arab Emirates, India, Hong Kong, and South Korea. html:
Coldplay are returning to North America in early summer 2025 for their long-running “Music of the Spheres World Tour.”

The 10-date stadium tour will take place in the US and Canada and arrives in support of the band’s brand new album, Moon Music.

Get Coldplay Tickets Here

Get your seat here, and read on for more info — including how to get ensure accesses to what is already one of the biggest tours in music history.

What Is Coldplay’s 2025 North American Tour?

Coldplay’s “Music of the Spheres World Tour” has been running since the release of their 2021 album, Music of the Spheres. They’ve continuously extended the tour with multiple legs over the last few years, making the 2025 run their fourth stint in the US since 2021. As such, the band are hitting several cities that they’ve missed in previous North American runs, like Toronto, Denver, Las Vegas, and more.

The North American tour begins with a show at Stanford Stadium in Stanford, California on May 31st, 2025. The run continues with shows in Las Vegas, Denver, El Paso, Toronto (marking some of the first-ever concerts at the brand new Rogers Stadium), Foxborough, Madison, and Nashville, concluding with a July 26th show in Miami.

Coldplay aren’t just touring this continent next year — they have a slew of international tour dates planned for 2025, including shows in United Arab Emirates, India, Hong Kong, and South Korea. Coldplay will also play 10 shows at London’s Wembley Stadium throughout August and September. Meanwhile, the band is closing out their 2024 run with a handful of shows in Australia and New Zealand. See below for the full list of Coldplay’s 2024-2025 tour dates.

“Music of the Spheres World Tour” recently became the first rock tour — and second tour ever (behind Taylor Swift’s “The Eras Tour”) — to gross over $1 billion dollars.

How Can I Get Tickets to Coldplay’s 2025 North American Tour?

Tickets for Coldplay’s 2025 North American “Music of the Spheres World Tour” dates go on sale to the general public beginning Friday, October 11th at 12:00 p.m. local time via Ticketmaster. An artist pre-sale is currently closed, but the band are also offering a limited number of Infinity Tickets as part of the public ticket on sale. These tickets are accessible to fans for an affordable price ($20 per ticket).

Once tickets go on sale, fans can look for deals or get tickets to sold-out shows via StubHub, where orders are 100% guaranteed through StubHub’s FanProtect program. StubHub is a secondary market ticketing platform, and prices may be higher or lower than face value, depending on demand.

Who Is Opening for Coldplay on Their 2025 North American Tour?

No openers have been listed yet for the North American leg of Coldplay’s “Music of the Spheres World Tour,” but we’ll update this post as soon as the band announces the tour’s supporting acts.
